reviews.review: Well, it was good until they made the game for free so that means i paid 15 for the game when i first got it and now i have to pay another 15 dollars to get prime so you wont play with cheaters! wow
Got higher potential after anticheat and ban system is updated , without that it is like not good game rn! xd

Pros and cons of the game are below: 
                                                                               Pros
- Very realistic game, the characters are realisticlly made.
- Game has many skins so you can buy them and show them to your friends or trade with them.
- Many maps with each one having unique sites.
- Huge variety of weapons and some grenades.
                                                                                    Cons
- Toxic community with a big amount of cheaters ( mostly in lower ranks ) and the anti cheat is not good.
- The game has blood in it and many people swear so it is not good for younger players.
- The skin feature can make you addicted to gambling and lose alot of money.

So in the end, the game is very toxic and has blood, but the characters are very realistic, you have a huge variety of weapons and the maps are very nicely made and each one has unique designs and site locations. Therefore, I give it 7/10. I recomend it but not for younger players or people that like gambling.
